title: hobo
name: properjs-hobo
description: A very small, modular DOM utility for modern web apps.

config.build_all: is eq not one next prev attr last first index parent filter detach append remove trigger prepend closest children removeAttr toggleClass

scripts.doc: jsdoc lib/ -r -R README.md -P package.json -t node_modules/jsdoc-oblivion/template -c node_modules/jsdoc-oblivion/template/jsdoc.conf.json -d docs
scripts.min: uglifyjs dist/hobo.build.dist.js -c -m -o dist/hobo.build.dist.min.js && uglifyjs dist/hobo.dist.js -c -m -o dist/hobo.dist.min.js
scripts.postbuild: webpack dist/hobo.build.js dist/hobo.build.dist.js && webpack hobo.js dist/hobo.dist.js && npm run min && npm run doc
